_header: Harkeneth sirs for my purpose / Is you to tell of Saint Ambrose
Subjects: Ambrose, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Ambrose, in one MS of the South English Legendary

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herkeneþ sires for my purposeIs ou to telle of seint
                    Ambrose…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And repreyue hem of WikkednesseBoþe more and eke
                    lesse

         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
